meanings.sent1: The epidermoid layer of skin protects us from harm.
meanings.sent2: Her epidermoid cells were healthy and functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: The epidermoid lotion made her skin feel smooth and soft.
meanings.sent4: His epidermoid shield of confidence never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The epidermoid barrier acted as a shield against the harsh sun rays.

meanings.definition: A benign tumor of the skin or mucous membrane.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the growth as an epidermoid.
meanings.sent2: She had a small epidermoid removed from her arm.
meanings.sent3: The epidermoid on his nose made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The epidermoid was as harmless as a dandelion in a field.
meanings.sent5: The epidermoid felt like a tiny pebble under her skin.
